pageProduct.name: Scholl Corn Gel Toe Sleeve
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Scholl Corn Gel Toe Sleeve with Cushioning Protection provides immediate relief from pressure & rubbing, making it ideal for corns and sore spots on toes.

Scholl Corn Gel Toe Sleeve How are Scholl Corn Gel Toe Sleeves different? Scholl Corn Gel Toe Sleeve provides relief from soreness.


What are the benefits?


- Ideal for corns on toes, sore toes and toenails


- Washable and reusable


- Made with Gelactiv technology

Boxed Contents: 1 Pack

Size: 1 Pack

Warnings

For external use only. Avoid using on cracked, broken skin. Keep out of reach of children.

Directions

Slip on to sore toe. Remove for at least 3-4 hours a day to let skin breathe

USAGE ADVICE

Handwash with mild soap and lukewarm water. Rinse thoroughly then leave to dry naturally. Dust with talc when dry.

SAFETY DIRECTIONS

Please seek advice before use if you have diabetes as your foot condition may require treatment by a healthcare professional.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store in a cold dry place out of direct sunlight. If seal on pack is broken, do not use.

Storage Temperature: Store below 25°C
